summary.para: The CMSG_CTRL_ADD_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR_PARA structure is used to add an unauthenticated attribute to a signer of a signed message. This structure is passed to if the dwCtrlType parameter is set to CMSG_CTRL_ADD_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR.
Size of this structure in bytes.
Index of the signer in the rgSigners array of pointers of structures in a signed message's structure. The unauthenticated attribute is to be added to this signer's information.
A CRYPT_DATA_BLOB structure that contains the encoded unauthenticated attribute as its pbData member.
